TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JavaSystem extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Provides access to system-related information and resources including standard input and output.

remarks.para:
Provides access to system-related information and resources including standard input and output. Enables clients to dynamically load native libraries. All methods of this class are accessed in a static way and the class itself can not be instantiated.
See Also

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Arraycopy (Java.Lang.Object src, int srcPos, Java.Lang.Object dst, int dstPos, int length);
.method public static hidebysig void Arraycopy(class Java.Lang.Object src, int32 srcPos, class Java.Lang.Object dst, int32 dstPos, int32 length) cil managed

Docs.param: the source array to copy the content.
the starting index of the content in src.
the destination array to copy the data into.
the starting index for the copied content in dst.
the number of elements to be copied.
Docs.summary: Copies length elements from the array src, starting at offset srcPos, into the array dst, starting at offset dstPos.

remarks.para: Copies length elements from the array src, starting at offset srcPos, into the array dst, starting at offset dstPos.
The source and destination arrays can be the same array, in which case copying is performed as if the source elements are first copied into a temporary array and then into the destination array.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string ClearProperty(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: To be added.
Docs.summary: Removes a specific system property.

remarks.para: Removes a specific system property. Most system properties are read only and cannot be cleared or modified. See for a list of such properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Java.IO.Console Console() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the associated with this VM, or null.

remarks.para: Returns the associated with this VM, or null. Not all VMs will have an associated console. A console is typically only available for programs run from the command line.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int64 CurrentTimeMillis() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the current time in milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00.

remarks.para: Returns the current time in milliseconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00.0 UTC.
This method always returns UTC times, regardless of the system's time zone. This is often called "Unix time" or "epoch time". Use a instance to format this time for display to a human.
This method shouldn't be used for measuring timeouts or other elapsed time measurements, as changing the system time can affect the results. Use for that.

Docs.summary: Default error output stream.

remarks.para: Default error output stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Exit(int32 code) cil managed

Docs.param: the return code.
Docs.summary: Causes the VM to stop running and the program to exit with the given exit status.

remarks.para: Causes the VM to stop running and the program to exit with the given exit status. If has been previously invoked with a true argument, then all objects will be properly garbage-collected and finalized first.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Gc() cil managed

Docs.summary: Indicates to the VM that it would be a good time to run the garbage collector.

remarks.para: Indicates to the VM that it would be a good time to run the garbage collector. Note that this is a hint only. There is no guarantee that the garbage collector will actually be run.

Docs.summary: Returns an unmodifiable map of all environment variables to their values.

remarks.para: Returns an unmodifiable map of all environment variables to their values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string Getenv(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: the name of the environment variable.
Docs.summary: Returns the value of the environment variable with the given name, or null if no such variable exists.

remarks.para: Returns the value of the environment variable with the given name, or null if no such variable exists.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string GetProperty(string propertyName) cil managed

Docs.param: the name of the system property to look up.
Docs.summary: Returns the value of a particular system property or null if no such property exists.

remarks.para: Returns the value of a particular system property or null if no such property exists.
The following properties are always provided by the Dalvik VM:

tr.td: Location of the VM on the file system
URL for VM vendor's web site

remarks.para: All of the above properties except for user.home and java.io.tmpdircannot be modified. Any attempt to change them will be a no-op.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32 IdentityHashCode(class Java.Lang.Object anObject) cil managed

Docs.param: the object to calculate the hash code.
Docs.summary: Returns an integer hash code for the parameter.

remarks.para: Returns an integer hash code for the parameter. The hash code returned is the same one that would be returned by the method java.lang.Object.hashCode(), whether or not the object's class has overridden hashCode(). The hash code for null is 0.

Docs.summary: Default input stream.

remarks.para: Default input stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Java.Nio.Channels.IChannel InheritedChannel() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the inherited channel from the creator of the current virtual machine.

remarks.para: Returns the inherited channel from the creator of the current virtual machine.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string LineSeparator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the system's line separator.

remarks.para: Returns the system's line separator. On Android, this is "\n". The value comes from the value of the line.separator system property.

On Android versions before Lollipop the line.separator system property can be modified but this method continues to return the original value. The system property cannot be modified on later versions of Android.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string MapLibraryName(string nickname) cil managed

Docs.param: the name of the library to look up.
Docs.summary: Returns the platform specific file name format for the shared library named by the argument.

remarks.para: Returns the platform specific file name format for the shared library named by the argument. On Android, this would turn "MyLibrary" into "libMyLibrary.so".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int64 NanoTime() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the current timestamp of the most precise timer available on the local system, in nanoseconds.

remarks.para: Returns the current timestamp of the most precise timer available on the local system, in nanoseconds. Equivalent to Linux's CLOCK_MONOTONIC.

This timestamp should only be used to measure a duration by comparing it against another timestamp on the same device. Values returned by this method do not have a defined correspondence to wall clock times; the zero value is typically whenever the device last booted. Use if you want to know what time it is.

Docs.summary: Default output stream.

remarks.para: Default output stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Java.Util.Properties Properties { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Returns the system properties.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
Returns the system properties. Note that this is not a copy, so that changes made to the returned Properties object will be reflected in subsequent calls to getProperty and getProperties.

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
Attempts to set all system properties. Copies all properties from p and discards system properties that are read only and cannot be modified. See for a list of such properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RunFinalization() cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides a hint to the VM that it would be useful to attempt to perform any outstanding object finalization.

remarks.para: Provides a hint to the VM that it would be useful to attempt to perform any outstanding object finalization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RunFinalizersOnExit(bool flag) cil managed

Docs.param: the flag determines if finalization on exit is enabled.
Docs.summary: Ensures that, when the VM is about to exit, all objects are finalized.

remarks.para: Ensures that, when the VM is about to exit, all objects are finalized. Note that all finalization which occurs when the system is exiting is performed after all running threads have been terminated.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Java.Lang.SecurityManager SecurityManager { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Returns null.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
Returns null. Android does not use SecurityManager. This method is only provided for source compatibility.

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
Throws SecurityException.
Security managers do not provide a secure environment for executing untrusted code and are unsupported on Android. Untrusted code cannot be safely isolated within a single VM on Android, so this method always throws a SecurityException.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
